overview: A 100% fictional short film that sends up Hollywood and toxic masculinity.A man with a history of mental illness begins to believe his teenage daughter is having an affair with the actress Oona Laurence and that Oona is an assassin out to kill him and all he loves.  Now in production, the 18-minute short film will arrive on vimeo in just over a year, August 1st 2021.
tagline: This film is a piece of satirical fiction.
title: Oona Laurence: Bisexual Assassin
